name: Dr. Maya Johnson
title: Executive Director
bio: Dr. Johnson brings 15 years of experience in community organizing and public policy. She holds a PhD in Urban Planning from MIT and has led safety initiatives in major metropolitan areas.

name: Marcus Williams
title: Chief Technology Officer
bio: Marcus is a former Google engineer with expertise in civic technology and community safety platforms. He founded two successful tech startups focused on social impact.

name: Dr. Keisha Brown
title: Director of Research
bio: Dr. Brown is a data scientist and criminologist specializing in community safety analytics. She has published extensively on neighborhood safety interventions and their effectiveness.

name: James Mitchell
title: Program Director
bio: James oversees our business incubator and training programs. He has a background in venture capital and has helped launch over 50 Black-owned businesses.

name: Sarah Davis
title: Community Outreach Coordinator
bio: Sarah manages our community partnerships and workshop programs. She has deep roots in community organizing and brings 10 years of experience in grassroots safety initiatives.
